messages.title: Dear Elector
messages.content: Up to Parliament being dissolved, I had the privilege of representing the Tewkesbury constituency since 1997. I am now offering myself for re-election as your Conservative Party candidate...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Further increases in funding for hospitals and schools
Protect our environment for the next generation

issues.education: Further increases in funding for schools
issues.environment: Protect our environment for the next generation
issues.health: Further increases in funding for hospitals

leaflet.personalStatement: I am totally dedicated to the Tewkesbury constituency...

politicalExperience.achievements: Represented a wide array of issues on behalf of constituents, campaigned for better treatment of veterans, animals, better broadband, and against inappropriate development...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Supporting public services has been a big priority... I have worked hard to protect our jobs... I campaigned strongly for our infrastructure... I have always believed that we should do more to protect the environment...
